text: Jeferson Moreira (born 27 September 1965) is a Brazilian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Brazil Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:People from Passo Fundo
title: Jeferson Moreira
